page.title: 08 WEEDON POST OFFICE
page.content: Recently we visited the {Post Office} and asked some questions. The owners have to be up at 05.00 hours whilst the people who deliver the letters arrive at 06.00 hours.Four ladies and one man deliver the post.Between 300 and 400 letters a day are posted. A first class stamp costs 17 pence and a second class stamp costs 13 pence.Road tax for a car is 100 pounds a year.Family allowance is 6.85 a week for each child. Adult women use the {Post Office} most often. The only change since 1980 has been the ending of telegrams.The owners don't forsee many changes except wider use of plastic money. At {Christmas} time they have to take on extra help to deliver all the additional cards and parcels.
